Key Arguments: The proposal is described as 'Orwellian', suggesting it is overly controlling or authoritarian.
The submitter believes that ACMA or any bureaucratic body should not have the power to dictate truth.
There is a strong emphasis on the importance of freedom of speech and expression.
The submitter views the proposal as a form of censorship.
Main Themes: Distrust in government or bureaucratic control
Notable Quotes: I am vehemently in opposition to this Orwellian proposal.
I do NOT and CANNOT support censorship.
